target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and professionals seeking accelerated learning and skill development
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Mentions criminally underfollowed despite expertise, suggesting underserved market for learning optimization

problems_validated.problem: People focus on specific skills instead of learning how to learn
problems_validated.market_gap: Nobody treats learning itself as a skill to optimize

products_tools.name: MuggleNet
products_tools.use_case: Harry Potter community and social network
products_tools.metrics: Number one Harry Potter community, started at age 13

business_strategies.strategy: 80/20 principle applied to learning across disciplines to gain mental models
business_strategies.implementation: Read 2 books per day equivalent, cross-pollinate knowledge across fields
business_strategies.expected_results: Faster adoption of new technologies and better pattern recognition
business_strategies.case_study: Crypto industry - being a polymath helped recognize value earlier due to multiple mental models

business_strategies.strategy: Use recommendations from respected people to build reading list
business_strategies.implementation: When someone you respect mentions a book, immediately add to notes and buy it
business_strategies.case_study: Reading list spans psychology, economics, product design based on recommendations

problems_solutions.solution: Treat learning itself as a skill to optimize, spend 1-3 hours daily on learning experiments

startup_ideas.target_market: Entrepreneurs and professionals seeking accelerated skill development
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Inefficient learning methods and lack of learning optimization
startup_ideas.validation: Test learning speed improvements with measurable outcomes

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Focusing on specific skills instead of learning how to learn
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Slower overall skill development and missed opportunities
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Go one meta level up and optimize the learning process itself
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Most people try to learn Spanish or programming without optimizing their learning methodology

growth_tactics.tactic: Use boredom as a compass for content selection
steps: Monitor boredom levels while consuming content
growth_tactics.results_expected: Higher quality learning and better retention

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Time to pass professional exams (bar exam, USMLE)
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Measure time from scratch to passing standardized tests
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use daily experimentation with learning techniques
Focus on books over articles due to lower switching costs

trends_signals.trend: Crypto requires polymathic knowledge for early adoption
trends_signals.opportunity: Cross-disciplinary knowledge provides competitive advantage in emerging technologies
Learning optimization is underexplored despite high impact potential

actionable_quotes.quote: Why not treat learning itself like if you want to be the world's fastest learner how would you do it
actionable_quotes.actionability: Start treating learning as a skill to optimize rather than focusing only on specific skills

actionable_quotes.quote: I basically use boredom as a compass
actionable_quotes.actionability: Use boredom as an indicator to switch to more valuable content

actionable_quotes.quote: First solve intelligence then solve everything else
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize learning optimization before specializing in specific domains

key_statistics.statistic: Reading 2 books per day equivalent of content
1-3 hours daily spent on learning optimization
